attributes.additional_details: The economy is stuck because people and companies have no money and yet the relentless assault from bureaucrats continues: Income Tax, National Insurance (its still a tax), Council Tax, VAT, Inheritance Tax, Capital Gains Tax, Corporation Tax, Air Paasenger Duty, Betting & Gambling Duty, Business Rates, Import Tax, Export Tax, Insurance Premium Tax, Pensions Tax, Landfil Tax, Stamp Duty, Stamp Duty Land Tax, Stamp Duty Reserve Tax, TV License, Road Tax, Fuel Duty, Petrol Revenue Tax, Green Tax, Climate Change Levy, Reneweable Energy Levy, Energy Tax, Tobacco Tax, Alcohol Tax, Product Adgregrate Levy, Hydrocarbon Oils Duty and more! How much more money do the Government want to continue their orgy of spending? Enough is enough! Put some life back into the economy by cutting taxes and let people decide what to spend their money on.
